code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Research.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Research=()=>{const[selectedPdf,setSelectedPdf]=useState(null);const documents=[{id:'1',title:'Sistemas Ciberfísicos Inteligentes',path:'/docs/1.pdf',description:'Investigación sobre integración de sistemas físicos y digitales'},{id:'2',title:'IoT y Automatización',path:'/docs/2.pdf',description:'Avances en Internet de las Cosas y automatización industrial'},{id:'3',title:'Inteligencia Artificial',path:'/docs/3.pdf',description:'Aplicaciones de IA en sistemas ciberfísicos'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"research-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"research-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Documentos de Investigaci\xF3n GISICF"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pdf-grid",children:documents.map(doc=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pdf-card",onClick:()=>setSelectedPdf(doc.path),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pdf-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDCC4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:doc.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:doc.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-button",children:"Ver PDF"})]},doc.id))}),selectedPdf&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pdf-modal",onClick:()=>setSelectedPdf(null),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button",onClick:()=>setSelectedPdf(null),children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("object",{data:selectedPdf,type:"application/pdf",width:"100%",height:"100%",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Tu navegador no puede mostrar el PDF.",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:selectedPdf,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"Desc\xE1rgalo aqu\xED"})]})})]})})]})});};export default Research;
